titles.title: To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to establish a Blue Technology center of expertise, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-1020.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 799.
